data.message:
FB -Can you please instruct me where to go to review the terms for posting a review. My honest and respectable posts keep getting removed by your team. 

I have received messages from others that have had their reviews removed as well. 

How is the review and rating system fair when a business can just flag a honest post to be removed, this is manipulation of the rating system.

replies.message: Come on FB? Are you really going to ignore my question as well?
